ðŸ“– Summary: Scira is a minimalistic AI-powered search engine designed to help users find information on the internet with proper citations. It leverages various AI models and APIs to provide features like web search, URL-specific search, weather information, code execution, location details, YouTube search, academic search, and more. Scira aims to provide a comprehensive search experience powered by AI.
